about_the_game:
Shatter your opponent's defenses and set them up for earthshaking super attacks!

Shattered is a 1-on-1 fighting game inspired by the greats of the ’90s. A ground based footsies fighter with 4 button controls, where you aim to shatter your opponent to grant you more options to dish out damage.

All this is presented in a beautifully crafted pixelart environment featuring top-notch animations! Play against your friends online via rollback netplay or dive into the story of worlds shattering and civilisations breaking.

Follow Julia, Ushah, Roxanne, Azar and others on their race against an infinite number of apocalypses threatening everything they hold dear.

The Characters


  • Julia: This reality hopping curator of infernal artifacts is a true jack of all trades.
  • Ushah: A warrior monk with unmatched power. Grab hold of your enemies with his powerful metal arm or hose them down with scalding steam.
  • Roxanne: On a mission to redeem her many past mistakes before her time runs out. A true defensive bulwark who can lash out with gunpowder justice.
  • Azar: This construct of unknowable power can switch from a methodical projectile shooting mode, to the powerful rushdown overdrive mode.

Shattering

Pressuring your opponent with overwhelming force breaks eventually breaks their body and will. The perfect chance to grab the moment in the fight!


Specialized shatter attacks can aid you in your mission to shatter your rivals.


Shattering your opponent opens up powerful Shatter Supers that deal massive damage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FTX 680 / Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A shattering revival of '90s fighting games set in a sci-fi/fantasy world inspired by European comics.
